remarks: Inequality derived from atom condition.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
atcvrne.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atcvrne.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atcvrne.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atcvrneN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ P C ( Q .\/ R ) ) -> Q =/= R ) $.
